questions.price: How much do the villas cost?
questions.priceAnswer: Between â‚¬295 and â‚¬495 per night for 2 people (depending on dates and villa).
questions.priceAnswerMobile: Between â‚¬295 and â‚¬495 per night for 2 people, depending on dates and villa.
questions.car: Do I need a rental car?
questions.carAnswer: It's recommended for exploring the island, its beaches and nature. But not essential if you want to relax at the villa. A taxi from the airport costs approx. â‚¬60.
questions.carAnswerMobile: Recommended for exploring the island, though not essential if you want to relax at the villa.
questions.locationAnswer: All are in Lajares, one of the most charming villages in northern Fuerteventura.
questions.togetherAnswer: They are independent villas. Some are in the same area (e.g. Mykonos, Santorini, Sicily and The Retreat).
questions.privateAnswer: Yes. Nothing is shared in any villa.
questions.privateAnswerMobile: Yes. Nothing is shared in any of our villas.
questions.childrenAnswer: Yes, as long as they are over 14 years old and accompanied by adults.
questions.childrenAnswerMobile: Children from 14 years. Some villas accept small pets, under care guidelines.
questions.petsAnswer: Yes, if they are well-behaved and our pet policy is respected.
questions.eventsAnswer: No. Our villas are designed for rest.

homefulness.subtitle: The cup you choose. The morning silence. The perfect shade at four.

villa.locationDesc: Our villa is located in Lajares, a peaceful village in northern Fuerteventura. Here you'll enjoy proximity to surf beaches, volcanoes and a bohemian atmosphere, ideal for disconnecting.
villa.onRequestDesc1: This villa is part of a special UNIQUE Homes selection and requires personalized confirmation.
villa.onRequestDesc2: Once the request is made, our team will contact you to confirm availability and conditions within a maximum of 24 hours.
villa.onRequestNote: This villa is managed on request due to its special characteristics.
villa.jacuzziNote: Perfect for enjoying a jacuzzi under the stars.

california.title: Villa California
california.subtitle: Open light. Long mornings.
california.description: A home designed for slow awakenings. Large windows invite the morning light, open spaces flow naturally, and a terrace where time seems to stand still. California is for those seeking clarity, spaciousness, and that feeling of freedom only an open horizon provides.

triptych.desc1: A home designed for slow awakenings, with spaces that flow naturally.
triptych.desc2: Large windows that invite the sunrise and embrace the horizon.
triptych.desc3: Where time seems to stand still and freedom is felt.

mykonos.title: Villa Mykonos
mykonos.subtitle: White. Air. Clarity.
mykonos.description:
Mykonos is an ideal home for couples seeking an intimate and luminous villa, where warmth, care, and serenity are felt from the first moment.

The pool, with organic and natural shapes, invites you to slow down.

The fireplace accompanies the quietest afternoons.
mykonos.editorialIntro: Designed by an architect from LeÃ³n and built with stone, wood and glass, it integrates with the nature of Fuerteventura: quiet, private and made for staying.

triptych.desc1: Mykonos is intimate, luminous and serene â€” you feel it from the first minute.
triptych.desc2: Clear water, organic shapes and a small relaxing cascade.
triptych.desc3: When evening falls, a gentle fire accompanies the quietest hours.

santorini.title: Villa Santorini
santorini.subtitle: Horizon. Refuge. Calm.
santorini.description: A refuge with infinite views. Santorini combines the intimacy of a cozy space with the openness of the horizon. Here sunsets are a ritual, and nights have that deep calm you only find when you're exactly where you want to be.

triptych.desc1: Intimacy of a cozy space with the openness of infinity.
triptych.desc2: Here they're a ritual. The horizon glows and everything stops.
triptych.desc3: That deep calm that only comes when you're where you want to be.

the-retreat.title: Villa The Retreat
the-retreat.subtitle: Inward and within.
the-retreat.description: A space to return to yourself. The Retreat is designed for introspection, with reading corners, meditation spaces, and that stillness that only exists when everything is designed for silence. Here luxury is time with yourself.

triptych.desc1: A space designed to return to yourself, for introspection.
triptych.desc2: Reading corners, meditation spaces, thoughtful stillness.
triptych.desc3: Here luxury is time with yourself.

bali.title: Villa Bali
bali.subtitle: Jungle. Water. Awakening.
bali.description: Nature as the protagonist. Bali is an immersion in greenery, with the sound of water as a constant soundtrack. Open spaces that blend with the tropical garden, natural materials, and that vital energy that only exists where nature rules.

triptych.desc1: An immersion in greenery, where nature is the protagonist.
triptych.desc2: Its sound as a constant soundtrack, pool among palm trees.
triptych.desc3: That vitality that only exists where nature rules.

wellnessPage.heroSubtitle: Sometimes, the best part of a vacation is simply staying home â€” enjoying the silence, nature and a bit of dolce far niente.
wellnessPage.intro: That's what makes a villa unique: space, calm and a true sense of home. And if you ever want a little retreat in Fuerteventura â€” to reconnect with your body and quiet your mind â€” we recommend our in-villa wellness experiences.
wellnessPage.massagesSubtitle: From classic sports massages (perfect after surfing) to exotic Japanese and Balinese techniques.
wellnessPage.ctaText: Book your stay at Unique Homes Lajares and discover how easy it is to reconnect with joy, balance and the simple pleasures of being â€” at home.

massages.relaxingDesc: Gentle strokes that dissolve tension and restore calm to body and mind.
massages.sportsDesc: Firm hands that release muscles after a day of surfing or hiking.
massages.anticelluliteDesc: Deep movements to activate circulation and awaken the skin.
massages.kobidoDesc: Ancestral techniques that brighten the face and soften expression.
massages.thaiDesc: Slow stretches that restore energy and release the body.
massages.lomiLomiDesc: A flowing, nurturing embrace â€” a guest favourite.

ourWayOfCaring.pageTitle: Our Way of Caring | Unique Homes Lajares
ourWayOfCaring.metaDescription: How we understand caring for the environment and well-being at our villas in Lajares.
ourWayOfCaring.title: Our way of caring
ourWayOfCaring.p1: We don't believe in grandiose speeches.
ourWayOfCaring.p2: We believe in doing things right, quietly and consistently.
ourWayOfCaring.p3: Our villas are designed to coexist with the Lajares environment, not to impose upon it. That's why we work with photovoltaic installations that allow us to run on practically clean energy and minimize impact during your stay.
ourWayOfCaring.p4: We take care of water usage, responsible waste management and the choice of durable materials and equipment. We bet on well-designed, well-maintained villas with conscious occupancy, far from overcrowding.
ourWayOfCaring.p5: We also understand well-being as part of this care: spaces designed for rest, silence and disconnection, and experiences to be enjoyed in the privacy of your own home, without unnecessary travel.
ourWayOfCaring.p6: We don't see it as an obligation or a sales argument.
ourWayOfCaring.p7: It's simply our way of being here.
ourWayOfCaring.limpiaventuraInvite: We invite you to join. Every Sunday a new adventure.
ourWayOfCaring.limpiaventuraDesc: Beaches, ravines, and in general, any natural area of Fuerteventura that needs attention. There are lots of strange things abandoned where you least expect them. They also organize seabed cleanups.
ourWayOfCaring.limpiaventuraProud: We are proud to collaborate with this much-needed project through a monthly financial contribution.
ourWayOfCaring.limpiaventuraDonation: Additionally, in 2025 we donated â‚¬1,000 for the purchase of a new pickup truck, which has already been acquired.
